info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:29PM PDT until September 03 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM PDT FOR SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 228 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hwy 138 Between I-15 And Hwy 2, or near I-15 Through The Cajon Pass, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Victorville, Hesperia, I-15 Through The Cajon Pass, Hwy 138 Between I-15 And Hwy 2 and Phelan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
